name: Hordes Of 20 a 20 MB Game!
description:
In  a post apocalyptic earth you have to survive. get your axe and start chopping! but after the timer reaches 0, you better be ready...

Info:

revive knocked out teammates by dropping food on them

chop down a tree with an axe to get wood!

to craft drop the raw materials onto the transparent points next to a crafting station to craft it!
